modName: Skyrim Quest Checklists and Quest Mod Checklists
summary: Checklist of quests covering Skyrim, Dawnguard, Dragonborn, and quest mods Agent of Righteous Might, Beyond Reach, Cutting Room Floor, Falskaar, Gray Cowl of Nocturnal, Helgen Reborn, Interesting NPCs, Moon and Star, Moonpath to Elsweyr, Rigmor of Bruma, The Notice Board, Undeath, Wheels of Lull, Vilja of Skyrim, and many more!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial][center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/51284-0-1499525575.png[/img][/center]
I am a completest, a checklist junkie, and an organization freak. I loved what dexmachina did with his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17893/?]Ultimate Skyrim Quests Overview and Checklist[/url]. I printed it out at work and set out to use it. Unfortunately, it was too big and too dark. I couldn't see my hand written check marks. I wanted a checklist I could use on paper I readily had on hand. As I started making this, I soon realized the magnitude of work dexmachina truly had put in his work. My version of this is a more minimal approach to the quest checklist.

These checklists come in two formats, PDF and Excel, for you to [color=#ffff00][b]print[/b][/color] and check off the quests as you complete them.

This is not a [font=Arial]mod you can use in game. For that, I recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60445/?]SkyComplete[/url]. SkyComplete will automatically track quests among many other things via MCM menu. SkyComplete tracks quests for Skyrim, Dawnguard, Dragonborn as well as popular quest mods Falskaar, Wyrmstooth, and Interesting NPCs.[/font]

This checklist contains the following quest checklists:
[font=Arial]•[/font] Skyrim
[font=Arial][font=Arial]•[/font] [/font]Dawnguard
[font=Arial]•[/font] Dragonborn
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33766/?]Agent of Righteous Might[/url] [i](version 1.1.0)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48467/?]Beyond Reach[/url] [i](version 3.51)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47327/?]Cutting Room Floor[/url] [i](version 2.0.0)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37994/?]Falskaar[/url] [i](version 1.2.1final)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64651/?]Gray Cowl of Nocturnal[/url] [i](version 1.2)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35841/?]Helgen Reborn[/url] [i](version 105.3)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8429/?]Interesting NPCs[/url] [i](version 3.10)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52397/?]Moon and Star[/url] [i](version 1.13)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9782/?]Moonpath to Elsweyr[/url] [i](version 9.5)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53068/?]Rigmor of Bruma[/url] [i](version 3.2)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68406/?]Summerset Isles[/url] [i](version 1.35)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70142/?]The Notice Board[/url] [i](version 2.1)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=122036928]ThirteenOranges Quest Series[/url]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40607/?]Undeath[/url] [i](version 1.3)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58672/?]Wheels of Lull[/url] [i](version 3.01)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26393/?]Vilja in Skyrim[/url] [i](version 4.2)[/i]
[font=Arial]•[/font] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25704/?]Wyrmstooth[/url] [i](version 1.16)[/i]

This checklist also contains the following I found handy:
• Bugs in a Jar Checklist
• Dragon Priest Masks Checklist
[font=Arial]• Dragon Shouts Checklist[/font]
• Litany of Larceny Targets Checklist + [font=Arial]Shadowmarks images and meanings[/font]
[font=Arial]• Player Level Dependent Quests List[/font]
• Stones of Barenziah Checklist
• Treasure Maps Checklist
• List of items to store up on for quests [i](example save 1 mammoth tusk for a Rare Gifts quest in Whiterun)[/i]
• List of books or notes to read to start quests


• Please let me know if I've misspelled anything or messed up a quest.
• Please provide ideas for anything else you'd like added.
• Please provide feedback.
• Please endorse if you like.

If I have missed anything or need to change anything please let me know. I tried to be as thorough as possible and checked everything via the creation kit which was more taxing than I ever thought it would be.

All information came from [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Main_Page]UESP[/url], [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/The_Elder_Scrolls_Wiki]The Elder Scrolls Wiki[/url], and the Creation Kit. Inspiration and formatting ideas came from dexmachina's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17893/?]Ultimate Skyrim Quests Overview and Checklist[/url]. I tried to keep things as spoiler free as possible.
[/font]
author: Sakr3d

files.name: Skyrim Quest Checklist
files.changelogHtml:
(Released July 31, 2014)

Added Content
+ Added quest list for Agent of Righteous Might.
+ Added quest list for Helgen Reborn.
+ Added quest list for Interesting NPCs.
+ Added quest list for Moon and Star.
+ Added quest list for ThirteenOranges Quest Series.
+ Added quest list for Undeath.
+ Updated quest list for Vilja in Skyrim to reflect changes in new version.
+ Added Alchemy, Blacksmithing, and Enchanting tutorial quests to Falkreath section.
+ Added Alchemy, Blacksmithing, and Enchanting tutorial quests to Riverwood section.
+ Added Alchemy, Blacksmithing, and Enchanting tutorial quests to Whiterun section.
+ Added Kill the Giant quest to Dawnstar section. Required quest to become Thane of Dawnstar.
+ Added The Forgemaster's Fingers quest to the Global section. Quest only available if you are not orc blood-kin.
+ Updated all 13 Mine Ore quests to reflect the type of ore to mine/sell.
+ Updated all 15 Gather Wheat quests to reflect the type of crop to gather/sell and the name of the farm to sell to.
+ Updated and highlighted all 10 quests that require the player to be a specific level.
+ Added player level dependent quests list to Global section.
+ Added checklist for Bugs in a Jar to Global section.
+ Added checklist for Stones of Barenziah to Global section.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Corrected Quests
+ Corrected Gather Wheat quest in Ivarstead. Correct quest giver and farm name.
+ Moved Forbidden Legends quest from College of Winterhold section to Dungeon Quests section.
+ Moved Forgotten Names quest from College of Winterhold section to Dungeon Quests section. Does not appear in journal.
+ Moved No Stone Unturned quest from College of Winterhold section to Thieves Guild section.
+ Moved Toying With the Dead quest from Riften section to Thieves Guild section.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Removed Quests
+ Removed Forbidden Legend from Global section. Listed under dungeon quests.
+ Removed Investigate the Hall of the Dead from Markarth section. Listed under daedric quests.
+ Removed Moss Mother Cavern from Falkreath section. Listed under dungeon quests.
+ Removed Soljund's Sinkhole from The Reach section. Listed under dungeon quests.
+ Removed Speak to Lod from Falkreath section. Listed under daedric quests.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Corrections and Formatting changes
+ Reformatted Companions quest line.
+ Reformatted Thieves Guild section.
+ Reformatted all quest lists to include the mod version the quest list was created against.
+ Corrected daedric and divine misspellings.
+ Corrected many misspellings in Falskaar, Moonpath, Vilja, and Wyrmstooth quest lists.
+ Corrected even more misspellings on the Skyrim, Dawnguard and Dragonborn quest lists.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

files.name: Skyrim Quest Checklist
files.changelogHtml:
(Release February 3, 2016)

Added Content
+ Added quest list for Beyond Reach v3.51.
+ Added quest list for Cutting Room Floor v2.0.0.
+ Added quest list for Gray Cowl of Nocturnal v1.2.
+ Added quest list for Rigmor of Bruma v3.2.
+ Added quest list for Summerset Isles v1.35.
+ Added quest list for The Notice Board v2.1.
+ Added quest list for Wheels of Lull v3.01.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Updated Content
+ Updated Falskaar to v1.2.1final. No new quests.
+ Updated Interesting NPCs to v3.10.
-- New Quests from v3.07: A Thousand Words, The Aldmeri Prisoner, A Debt of Blood, As You Like It
-- New Quests from v3.08: + Children of the Dust, The Curse.
-- Extra Unknown Quests: A Good Fit, A New Dawn, Boobs, Conspiracy of the Steps, Fire and Blood
-- Extra Unknown Quests: Glathriel's Bow, Gorr the Wanderer, HummmmBaby, Immortal Sin, Mzinchaleft Quest
-- Extra Unknown Quests: Notice to Adventurer's, Runaways, The Bird's Eye, The Bladebinder, The Bounty Hunter
-- Extra Unknown Quests: The Good Inside, The Hidden Blade, The Queen of Mereth, The Swamp Knight, The Winter Flower
-- Extra Unknown Quests: The Wolf of Greywater Grotto, Treads the Ashes, Virtuous Blood
+ Updated Moon and Star to v1.13. No new quests.
+ Updated Vilja in Skyrim to v4.2.
-- New Quests from v4.01 A Better Wolfcry Armor, Favorite Places, Finding a Satchel
+ Updated Wyrmstooth to v1.16. No new quests.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Removed Quests
+ Removed Curses! Quest from Moon and Star mod quest list. It's no longer a quest.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Corrections
+ Highlighted Forgotten Legends quest on the Dungeon Quests page as a side quest.
+ Changed Outside of Windhelm to Outside of Falkreath on the Falkreath Hold page.
+ Quest giver Hert for the Chop Wood quest was sized at 10pt instead of 8pt.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
